item.title: Aspose.Cells for JasperReports 1.0.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for JasperReports 1.0.1 We are happy to announceAspose.Cells for JasperReports 1.0.1! What’s new: Font sizes are adjusted appropriately to paste characters in Microsoft Excel format similar to characters in PDF format. Axis labels (of Charts) in date format are rendered correctly and accordingly. Gradient Fill effects for the areas are supported including chart’s background (chart area, plot area etc.), legend’s background, bars and bubbles etc.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for JasperReports 1.1.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for JasperReports 1.1.0 We are happy to announce Aspose.Cells for JasperReports v1.1.0 for the users!What’s new: Supports Microsoft Excel 97 to 2003 and Microsoft Excel 2007 formats. More details could be found at the document “Configuration Parameters” in the product documentation. Fixes several bugs of calculation in report element size. Supports JasperReports 3.7.x.
